articles.author: Alvise Armellini, Valentina Za
articles.title: Italian banks recover after government caps windfall tax - Reuters
articles.description: Italy's government has capped the impact of a surprise windfall tax imposed on profits generated by the country's banks, prompting a recovery in financial stocks on Wednesday after <a href="/world/europe/italy-approves-40-windfall-tax-on-banks-be-limited-2023…
articles.content: ROME, Aug 9 (Reuters) - Italy's government has capped the impact of a surprise windfall tax imposed on profits generated by the country's banks, prompting a recovery in financial stocks on Wednesday … [+2469 chars]
